description: Bald monk who was at Tougen Abbey with Koumei. Fights and knocks out Chouhi when she tries to follow Kan`u to the Abbey. When Koumei leaves for Seito, he goes along with her. An A-rank fighter, he has a perverted side that is revealed when he puts on the Sinroseki necklace. He appears to have a crush on Chouhi.
name: Kouchuu Kanshou
